Concrete legal speed restriction after an oncoming intersection.

If there is a change of the speed restriction inbetween the next 100m there will be a linaric adaption from the actual to the new one. If there is no speed restriction change the actual speed restriction will be send. If the actual driven segment is a curve the speed restriction will adapt to the radius but will never be higher than the actual speed restriction.

The assistant that prevents the start up in case of emergent situations. The values are 0: Inactive, 1: Warning from the left, 2: Warning from the right, 3: Warning in front)
